creator: Eilz2PSAEAA
name: Servicemesh - Raft candidate state Detector
programText:
A = data('gauge.consul.raft.state.candidate', filter=filter('consul_mode', 'server')).count().sum(over='10s').publish(label='A')
detect(when(A > threshold(0), lasting='1m')).publish('Servicemesh - Raft candidate state Detector')

rules.description: The value of consul.raft.state.candidate is above 0.
